data: Some ten years before the revolt of our American colonies, there was situate in one of our midland counties, on the borders of an extensive forest, an ancient hall that belonged to the Herberts, but which, though ever well preserved, had not until that period been visited by any member of the family, since the exile of the Stuarts.
midland counties | extensive forest | ancient hall
ten years before the revolt of our American colonies | since the exile of the Stuarts
